content: *a new **free** pattern that is perfect for those lonely variegated skeins in your stash * thank you for supporting me to produce free patterns by buying others from my store 1 **all 50% off for a limited time ** *soft light filters through the trees scattering colour across the forest floor warm golds and gentle pinks glowing as dappled sunlight falls through the canopy * **dappled path mitts** capture that gentle play of light and movement with slipped stitches that let variegated yarns shine creating fabric that feels alive and subtly textured like sunlight on a woodland trail designed to be **simple straightforward and deeply satisfying to knit** dappled path mitts feature an easy rhythmic stitch pattern that s perfect for mindful making the pattern is especially well suited to **variegated and tonal yarns** allowing colour changes to do the work while the slipped stitches add quiet interest without complexity using just **45-55g of yarn** these fingerless mitts are an ideal **last-minute gift** a relaxing in-between project or a practical option for **charity knitting** best of all the pattern is **free** my gift to you so you can cast on enjoy the journey and perhaps knit more than one pair along the way if you like this design please add it to your favourites and check out my other patterns here 2 **yarn** samples were knit in malabrigo yarn rios worsted weight blue/brown/grey 55g/106m/116y for the pair zakami superwash merino dk pink/burgundy/yellow 47g/94m/103y for the pair manos del uruguay silk blend multicoloured 43g/118m/129y for the pair **sizes** one size to fit hand circumference 18-22 cm/7-9 designed to fit with 2-6cm/1-2 5 negative ease actual circumference 16 cm/7 unstretched actual length 20 5 cm/8 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/sophie-mckane 2 https //www ravelry com/designers/sophie-mckane
